featured.title: Shape Shooter
featured.excerpt: A 2D top-down shooter where players must shoot, survive, and upgrade their ship to defeat waves of enemies.

featured.title: CPPCrates
featured.excerpt: A console based C++ game about opening crates and earning money.

featured.title: Ratventure
featured.excerpt: A 3D time-trial platformer created as part of a 10 day game jam, where players venture into sewer levels as a rat with one goal: collect the cheese as fast as possible.

other.title: Pickup Filter
other.excerpt: A Minecraft server plugin adding an extensive item filter pickup solution featuring customisable profiles and clean menus.

other.title: Sprout & Shellshock
other.excerpt: A 3D game developed from a university framework with a tank as the player that I put a spin on, turning it into a farming simulator.

other.title: Drill Defender
other.excerpt: A game jam prototype where players explore a procedurally generated asteroid, gathering resources and upgrades as the last robot on a lost mining outpost.

other.title: Ender Pouch
other.excerpt: A Minecraft server plugin adding ender chest features like portable access, staff utilities, and more.

other.title: 2 Player Puzzles Obby
other.excerpt: A teamwork obstacle course game where players must work together to solve puzzles by pushing buttons and opening pathways to reach the end of 12 distinct levels.

other.title: Teleportation Crystals
other.excerpt: A Minecraft server plugin adding teleportation crystals, an item that allows players to store and return to a location.

other.title: Surveillance State
other.excerpt: A 3D Unity game created for a college project, where players monitor surveillance cameras to find and report anomalous 'incidents' whilst avoiding losing their mind.

other.title: The Ghost in Me
other.excerpt: A 2D puzzle-platformer developed during a 5-day game jam, where players embody a reaper using ghostly powers to guide souls, unlock doors, evade obstacles, and help spirits cross over.

other.title: Thieves of Mind
other.excerpt: A Roblox game made in a 24-hour game jam with the theme 'mind control', where players, as alien marauders, use mind control to possess townsfolk, steal valuables, and upgrade supernatural abilities.

other.title: Graveyard Tycoon
other.excerpt: A Roblox game that expands on the typical tycoon experience, where players collect and sell bones to upgrade their graveyard, unlock areas, and enhance abilities.
